mapper.select: SELECT ps_num, pi_image, p_name, p_price, p_content, ps_expiration, ps_price, ps_count, ps_update FROM seller s INNER JOIN store st ON s.s_num = st.s_num INNER JOIN productsell ps ON ps.s_num = s.s_num INNER JOIN product p ON p.p_num = ps.p_num INNER JOIN proimage pi ON pi.pi_num = p.pi_num WHERE s_id = 'seller_user1' AND ps_state = 0 ORDER BY p_name
